amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore $24 million in assistance to the states of the former Soviet Union.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore $24 million in funds appropriated to the former Soviet states. The amendment would reduce $34 million in funds appropriated for AID reform and downsizing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownback amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 78 - 340 (Roll no. 422).
